verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נָחֲל֥וּ <S%H5157><s%> na-cha-Lu inherited בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And these [are the countries] which the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִֽחֲל֜וּ <S%H5157><s%> ni-cha-Lu distributed for inheritance אוֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar which Eleazar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> vi-ho-Shu-a' and Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> bin- the son נ֔וּן <S%H5126><s%> Nun, of Nun וְרָאשֵׁ֛י <S%H7218><s%> ve-ra-Shei and the heads אֲב֥וֹת <S%H1><s%> a-Vot of the fathers הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Tot of the tribes לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

בְּגוֹרַ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> be-go-Ral By lot נַחֲלָתָ֑ם <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tam; [was] their inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- by the hand מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, of Moses לְתִשְׁעַ֥ת <S%H8672><s%> le-tish-'At for the nine הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Tot tribes וַחֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi and [for] the half הַמַּטֶּֽה׃ <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Teh. tribe

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan had given מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh For Moses נַחֲלַ֨ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat the inheritance שְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei of two הַמַּטּוֹת֙ <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-tOt tribes וַחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi and an half הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Teh, tribe מֵעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> me-'E-ver on the other side לַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> lai-yar-Den; Jordan וְלַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-Lal-vi-Yim, but unto the Levites לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan he gave נַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah none inheritance בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cham. among

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הָי֧וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- For the children יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef of Joseph שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei were two מַטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> mat-Tot tribes מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh Manasseh וְאֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> ve-'ef-Ra-yim; and Ephraim וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not נָתְנוּ֩ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu therefore they gave חֵ֨לֶק <S%H2506><s%> Che-lek no part לַלְוִיִּ֜ם <S%H3881><s%> lal-vi-Yim unto the Levites בָּאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, in the land כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo עָרִים֙ <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim save cities לָשֶׁ֔בֶת <S%H3427><s%> la-She-vet, to dwell וּמִ֨גְרְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <S%H4054><s%> u-Mig-re-shei-Hem, [in] with their suburbs לְמִקְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4735><s%> le-mik-nei-Hem for their cattle וּלְקִנְיָנָֽם׃ <S%H7075><s%> u-le-kin-ya-Nam. and for their substance

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh As the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, Moses כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken Thus עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su did בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei so the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַֽיַּחְלְק֖וּ <S%H2505><s%> vai-yach-le-Ku and they divided אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the land פ Peh

וַיִּגְּשׁ֨וּ <S%H5066><s%> vai-yig-ge-Shu came בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- Then the children יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua בַּגִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> bag-gil-Gal, in Gilgal וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, and כָּלֵ֥ב <S%H3612><s%> ka-Lev and Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּ֖ה <S%H3312><s%> ye-fun-Neh of Jephunneh הַקְּנִזִּ֑י <S%H7074><s%> hak-ke-niz-Zi; the Kenezite אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You יָדַ֡עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta unto him Thou knowest אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָר֩ <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God עַ֧ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and אֹדוֹתַ֛י <S%H182><s%> o-do-Tai concerning me וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and אֹדוֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H182><s%> o-do-Tei-cha and thee בְּקָדֵ֥שׁ be-ka-Desh בַּרְנֵֽעַ׃ <S%H6947><s%> bar-Ne-a'. in Kadeshbarnea

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im Forty שָׁנָ֜ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi, I בִּ֠שְׁלֹחַ <S%H7971><s%> Bish-lo-ach sent מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh [was] I when Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> 'e-ved- the servant יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֹתִ֛י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti מִקָּדֵ֥שׁ mik-ka-Desh בַּרְנֵ֖עַ <S%H6947><s%> bar-Ne-a' me from Kadeshbarnea לְרַגֵּ֣ל <S%H7270><s%> le-rag-Gel to espy out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the land וָאָשֵׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> va-'a-Shev again אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var, him word כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- as in לְבָבִֽי׃ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Vi. as [it was] in mine heart

וְאַחַי֙ <S%H251><s%> ve-'a-Chai Nevertheless my brethren אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עָל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu that went up עִמִּ֔י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi, with הִמְסִ֖יו <S%H4529><s%> him-Siv melt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> lev with me made the heart הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; of the people וְאָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi I מִלֵּ֔אתִי <S%H4390><s%> mil-Le-ti, but I wholly אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei followed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai. my God

וַיִּשָּׁבַ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> vai-yish-sha-Va' sware מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom on that day הַהוּא֮ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> Lo, not הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz Surely the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דָּרְכָ֤ה <S%H1869><s%> da-re-Chah have trodden רַגְלְךָ֙ <S%H7272><s%> rag-le-Cha whereon thy feet בָּ֔הּ Bah, לְךָ֨ le-Cha תִֽהְיֶ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become לְנַחֲלָ֛ה <S%H5159><s%> le-na-cha-Lah shall be thine inheritance וּלְבָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-le-va-Nei-cha and thy children's עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- for עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam; ever כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because מִלֵּ֔אתָ <S%H4390><s%> mil-Le-ta, because thou hast wholly אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei followed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai. my God

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, Now הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold הֶחֱיָ֨ה <S%H2421><s%> he-che-Yah hath kept me alive יְהוָ֣ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And now behold the LORD אוֹתִי֮ <S%H853><s%> o-Ti כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher when דִּבֵּר֒ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber as he said זֶה֩ <S%H2088><s%> zeh these אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im these forty וְחָמֵ֜שׁ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-Mesh and five שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years מֵ֠אָז <S%H227><s%> Me-'oz even since דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var this word הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- when הָלַ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Lach wandered יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El while [the children of] Israel בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah and now הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, and now lo I [am] this day בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh and five וּשְׁמוֹנִ֖ים <S%H8084><s%> u-she-mo-Nim fourscore שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah. years

עוֹדֶ֨נִּי <S%H5750><s%> o-Den-ni I am still הַיּ֜וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom this day חָזָ֗ק <S%H2389><s%> cha-Zak, As yet I [am as] strong כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher I בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom as [I was] in the day שְׁלֹ֤חַ <S%H7971><s%> she-Lo-ach sent אוֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Ti מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, that Moses כְּכֹ֥חִי <S%H3581><s%> ke-Cho-chi me as my strength אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> 'az was then וּכְכֹ֣חִי <S%H3581><s%> u-che-Cho-chi [was] then even so [is] my strength עָ֑תָּה <S%H6258><s%> 'At-tah; is now לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah now for war וְלָצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> ve-la-Tzet both to go out וְלָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> ve-la-Vo. and to come in

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, Now תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> te-nah- Now therefore give לִּי֙ li אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har me this mountain הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh whereof the LORD בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom in that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu; he כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אַתָּֽה־ <S%H859><s%> 'at-tah- you שָׁמַעְתָּ֩ <S%H8085><s%> sha-ma'-Ta for thou heardest בַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> vai-Yom in that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that עֲנָקִ֣ים <S%H6062><s%> 'a-na-Kim how the Anakims שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, there וְעָרִים֙ <S%H5892><s%> ve-'a-Rim [were] there and [that] the cities גְּדֹל֣וֹת <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lot [were] great בְּצֻר֔וֹת <S%H1219><s%> be-tzu-Rot, [and] fenced אוּלַ֨י <S%H194><s%> 'u-Lai if so be יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אוֹתִי֙ <S%H854><s%> o-Ti [will be] with וְה֣וֹרַשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H3423><s%> ve-Ho-rash-Tim, me then I shall be able to drive them out כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. as the LORD

וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <S%H1288><s%> vay-va-re-Che-hu blessed יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a'; And Joshua וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten him and gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֶבְר֛וֹן <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ron Hebron לְכָלֵ֥ב <S%H3612><s%> le-cha-Lev unto Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּ֖ה <S%H3312><s%> ye-fun-Neh of Jephunneh לְנַחֲלָֽה׃ <S%H5159><s%> le-na-cha-Lah. for an inheritance

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that הָיְתָֽה־ <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-tah- became חֶ֠בְרוֹן <S%H2275><s%> Chev-ron Hebron לְכָלֵ֨ב <S%H3612><s%> le-cha-Lev of Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּ֤ה <S%H3312><s%> ye-fun-Neh of Jephunneh הַקְּנִזִּי֙ <S%H7074><s%> hak-ke-niz-Zi the Kenezite לְֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> le-na-cha-Lah, therefore became the inheritance עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an because אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after מִלֵּ֔א <S%H4390><s%> mil-Le, because that he wholly אַחֲרֵ֕י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei followed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְשֵׁ֨ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem And the name חֶבְר֤וֹן <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ron of Hebron לְפָנִים֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nim before קִרְיַ֣ת kir-Yat אַרְבַּ֔ע <S%H7153><s%> 'ar-Ba', [was] Kirjatharba הָאָדָ֧ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam man הַגָּד֛וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol [which Arba was] a great בָּעֲנָקִ֖ים <S%H6062><s%> ba-'a-na-Kim among the Anakims ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu; he וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz And the land שָׁקְטָ֖ה <S%H8252><s%> sha-ke-Tah had rest מִמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> mi-mil-cha-Mah. from war פ Peh
